amendment.description: Page 63, line 13, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $5,000,000)". Page 134, line 20, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $5,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for NIH's Building and Facilities account by $5 million to help to address an estimated $2 billion backlog in maintenance and repairs.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Raskin amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Raskin.
